macro.name: BAUD
macro.description: Serial communication baud rate, defaults to 9600.

macro.name: BITS
macro.description: Serial communication number of bits, defaults to 7.

macro.name: PARITY
macro.description: Serial communication parity, defaults to even.

macro.name: STOP
macro.description: Serial communication stop bit, defaults to 1.

macro.name: COMMS_MODE
macro.description: Comms mode, eibisynch or modbus. Defaults to eibisynch.

macro.name: ADDR_1
macro.description: Address for the 1st Eurotherm on this port e.g. 01. Blank for do not use.

macro.name: ADDR_2
macro.description: Address for the 2nd Eurotherm on this port e.g. 02. Blank for do not use.

macro.name: ADDR_3
macro.description: Address for the 3rd Eurotherm on this port e.g. 03. Blank for do not use.

macro.name: ADDR_4
macro.description: Address for the 4th Eurotherm on this port e.g. 04. Blank for do not use.

macro.name: ADDR_5
macro.description: Address for the 5th Eurotherm on this port e.g. 05. Blank for do not use.

macro.name: ADDR_6
macro.description: Address for the 6th Eurotherm on this port e.g. 06. Blank for do not use.

macro.name: ADDR_7
macro.description: Address for the 7th Eurotherm on this port e.g. 07. Blank for do not use.

macro.name: ADDR_8
macro.description: Address for the 8th Eurotherm on this port e.g. 08. Blank for do not use.

macro.name: ADDR_9
macro.description: Address for the 9th Eurotherm on this port e.g. 09. Blank for do not use.

macro.name: ADDR_10
macro.description: Address for the 10th Eurotherm on this port e.g. 10. Blank for do not use.

macro.name: LOCAL_CALIB
macro.description: Use local instrument calibration directory instead of common one? Default is no.

macro.name: NEEDLE_VALVE
macro.description: Use extra functionality for the WISH Automatic needle valve?
